attributes.action: Change the name of 'Great Britain' to 'Awesome Britain' or 'Megawesome Britain'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please change the name of Great Britain to either Awesome Britain or Megawesome Britain.

We love Britain and we don't think that name Great does it justice, also we want a name that fits into the 21st Century! One that will make other countries envious of us.

Please, we're an awesome Island lets change our name to show it!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
